SELECT SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS_ID ,
SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_1 , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SENIN_ID_1 , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_2 , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SENIN_ID_2 ,
SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.BIKOU ,
SENIN1.SEI || ' ' || SENIN1.MEI as NAME_1, SENIN2.SEI || ' ' || SENIN2.MEI as NAME_2,
SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.DELETE_FLAG , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.SEND_FLAG , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.VESSEL_ID , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.DATA_NO , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.USER_KEY , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.RENEW_DATE , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.RENEW_USER_ID , SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.TS
FROM SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS
INNER JOIN MS_SENIN SENIN1 ON SENIN1.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SENIN_ID_1 INNER JOIN MS_SENIN SENIN2 ON SENIN2.MS_SENIN_ID = SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.MS_SENIN_ID_2
WHERE SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS.DELETE_FLAG = 0
AND (SENIN1.SEI || ' ' || SENIN1.MEI LIKE :NAME OR SENIN2.SEI || ' ' || SENIN2.MEI LIKE :NAME)

INSERT INTO SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS( SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS_ID ,
MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_1 , MS_SENIN_ID_1 , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_2 , MS_SENIN_ID_2 ,
BIKOU ,
DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO , USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID , TS ) VALUES( :SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS_ID ,
:MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_1 , :MS_SENIN_ID_1 , :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_2 , :MS_SENIN_ID_2 , :BIKOU ,
:DELETE_FLAG , :SEND_FLAG , :VESSEL_ID , :DATA_NO , :USER_KEY , :RENEW_DATE , :RENEW_USER_ID , :TS )

UPDATE SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS SET MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_1 = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_1 , MS_SENIN_ID_1 = :MS_SENIN_ID_1 , MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_2 = :MS_SI_SHOKUMEI_ID_2 , MS_SENIN_ID_2 = :MS_SENIN_ID_2 ,
BIKOU = :BIKOU ,
DELETE_FLAG = :DELETE_FLAG , SEND_FLAG = :SEND_FLAG , VESSEL_ID = :VESSEL_ID , DATA_NO = :DATA_NO , USER_KEY = :USER_KEY , RENEW_DATE = :RENEW_DATE , RENEW_USER_ID = :RENEW_USER_ID , TS = :TS
WHERE SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS_ID = :SI_FELLOW_PASSENGERS_ID AND TS = :TS
